content.html: I published an update the progress on Rust Coreutils: sylvestre.ledru.info/blog/2022/01/2… TLDR: we are making progress on the Rust implementation of the GNU Coreutils and, with the kernel moving to Rust too, it is probably a potential path for the future of Linux!
content.value:
I published an update the progress on Rust Coreutils:
sylvestre.ledru.info/blog/2022/01/2…
TLDR: we are making progress on the Rust implementation of the GNU Coreutils and, with the kernel moving to Rust too, it is probably a potential path for the future of Linux!
